metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the subscription.

canceled_at.description: The timestamp at which the subscription was canceled.

cancel_at.description: The timestamp at which the subscription will be canceled.

livemode.description: Indicates if the subscription is in live mode.

start_date.description: The start date of the subscription.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'items'.

data.description: Data related to the subscription items.

has_more.description: Indicates if there are more items in the subscription.

total_count.description: The total count of items in the subscription.

url.description: The URL to access the subscription items.

id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription.

trial_start.description: The start date of the trial period for the subscription.

application_fee_percent.description: The percentage of the subscription fee that goes to the application.

billing_cycle_anchor.description: The anchor point for determining the billing cycle.

billing_cycle_anchor_config.description: Configuration for the billing cycle anchor.

invoice_settings.description: Settings related to invoicing for the subscription.

cancel_at_period_end.description: Indicates if the subscription should be canceled at the end of the current period.

tax_percent.description: The percentage of tax applied to the subscription.

discount.description: Information about any discounts applied to the subscription.

end.description: The end date of the discount.

coupon.description: Details of the coupon discount applied to the subscription.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the coupon.

valid.description: Indicates if the coupon is valid.

livemode.description: Indicates if the coupon is in live mode.

amount_off.description: The amount discounted by the coupon.

redeem_by.description: The date by which the coupon must be redeemed.

duration_in_months.description: The duration in months for which the coupon is valid.

percent_off_precise.description: Precise percentage off applied by the coupon.

max_redemptions.description: The maximum number of times the coupon can be redeemed.

times_redeemed.description: The number of times the coupon has been redeemed.

duration.description: The duration of the coupon redemption.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'coupon'.

percent_off.description: The percentage off applied by the coupon.

created.description: The timestamp when the coupon was created.

customer.description: The customer associated with the discount.

start.description: The start date of the discount.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'discount'.

subscription.description: The subscription to which the discount is applied.

current_period_end.description: The timestamp at which the current period ends.

plan.description: Details of the plan associated with the subscription.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the plan.

product.description: The product associated with the plan.

statement_description.description: The statement description of the plan.

livemode.description: Indicates if the plan is in live mode.

tiers_mode.description: The mode of tiers for the plan.

active.description: Indicates if the plan is active.

id.description: The unique identifier of the plan.

flat_amount.description: The flat amount applied in the tier.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount applied in the tier.

up_to.description: The upper limit for the tier.

created.description: The timestamp at which the plan was created.

transform_usage.description: Transformation applied to usage for the plan.

interval_count.description: The count of intervals for the plan.

aggregate_usage.description: The type of usage aggregation for the plan.

trial_period_days.description: The number of trial period days for the plan.

billing_scheme.description: The billing scheme of the plan.

statement_descriptor.description: The statement descriptor of the plan.

usage_type.description: The type of usage for the plan.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'plan'.

billing.description: The billing method for the subscription.

days_until_due.description: The number of days until payment is due for the subscription.

created.description: The timestamp at which the subscription was created.

updated.description: The timestamp at which the subscription was last updated.

ended_at.description: The timestamp at which the subscription ended.

customer.description: The customer associated with the subscription.

current_period_start.description: The timestamp at which the current period started.

trial_end.description: The end date of the trial period for the subscription.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'subscription'.

pending_setup_intent.description: The pending setup intent for the subscription.

currency.description: The currency used for the subscription.

transfer_data.description: Data related to transfers for the subscription.

application.description: The application linked to the subscription.

test_clock.description: The test clock for subscription testing purposes.

automatic_tax.description: Data related to automatic tax calculations for the subscription.

enabled.description: Indicates if automatic tax calculation is enabled for the subscription.

payment_settings.description: Settings related to payment for the subscription.

save_default_payment_method.description: Indicates if the default payment method should be saved.

next_pending_invoice_item_invoice.description: The next pending invoice item invoice.

default_source.description: The default payment source for the subscription.

default_payment_method.description: The default payment method for the subscription.

collection_method.description: The method of collection for the subscription.

pending_invoice_item_interval.description: Interval settings for pending invoice items.

interval.description: The interval for pending invoice items.

interval_count.description: The count of intervals for pending invoice items.

default_tax_rates.description: The default tax rates applied to the subscription.

pause_collection.description: Details related to pausing the collection for the subscription.

resumes_at.description: The timestamp at which collection resumes.

cancellation_details.description: Details related to the cancellation of the subscription.

comment.description: Any comments provided during the cancellation.

reason.description: The reason for canceling the subscription.

latest_invoice.description: Details of the latest invoice generated for the subscription.

pending_update.description: Details of any pending updates for the subscription.

billing_cycle_anchor.description: The anchor point for any pending billing cycle update.

expires_at.description: The timestamp at which the pending update expires.

subscription_items.description: Items included in the subscription update.

id.description: The unique identifier of the updated subscription item.

object.description: Type of object, in this case, 'subscription item'.

billing_thresholds.description: Thresholds for billing in the updated subscription item.

created.description: The timestamp at which the updated subscription item was created.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the updated subscription item.

price.description: The price of the updated subscription item.

quantity.description: The quantity of the updated subscription item.

subscription.description: The subscription to which the item is updated.

tax_rates.description: Tax rates applied to the updated subscription item.

trial_end.description: The end date of the trial period for the pending update.

trial_from_plan.description: Indicates if the trial period is based on the plan for the pending update.

description.description: A brief description of the subscription.

schedule.description: The schedule associated with the subscription.

trial_settings.description: Settings related to the trial period of the subscription.

end_behavior.description: Behavior at the end of the trial period.

missing_payment_method.description: Handling of missing payment method at the end of the trial.

on_behalf_of.description: The entity on whose behalf the subscription is made.

billing_thresholds.description: Settings for billing thresholds such as usage-based pricing or limit enforcement.

amount_gte.description: The threshold amount for triggering a billing cycle anchor reset.

reset_billing_cycle_anchor.description: Indicates if the billing cycle anchor should be reset based on the threshold.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the subscription has been deleted.
